channel.title: ~_-VERSATILE - Greatest 317 base / Great for Starters & Pros !-_~
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Versatile Server & Client 317 Base[/size] [size=4pt]Epic[/size]
LATEST UPDATE: SERVER GUI - CONTROL EVERYTHING WITHOUT HAVING TO BE LOGGED ON / CAN BE CONTROLLED BY OTHER ADMINS AND MODS YOU MUST GIVE PERMISSION - FOR MORE DETAILS READ THE "READ ME" FILE IN THE SERVER FILES .
[IMG]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/4043/80772248.jpg[/img]
-Features`
`Has 99% working clan chat! - Only 1% missing is that you have to type ::leave to leave chatroom, the full 100% clan with leave button is only for my current server `Fixed all bugs, no clippings, duping, xloggings. `Everything just like runescape (except quests lol) working doors / correct npc's locations , all runescapes shops , all runescapes objects , and models . `Client is very basic, comes with a very basic Jframe for anyone to edit. `Very stable server can hold up to 500 players on a 1mb ram , without any lag, [s]it has its own lag reducer runner in client[/s] . EDIT: removed lag reducer (only for original)
`A Very Organized class files, very easy to find, and every skill is class handeld! Make your own scripted events or major edits ! best base to work with , no more of that garbage Delta servers ! Learn more with this base, and easy as pie to use mysql with it!
Loaded 10552 item definitions. Loaded 63 boots equips Loaded 160 capes equips Loaded 46 gloves equips Loaded 151 shields equips Loaded 56 amulets equips Loaded 59 arrows equips Loaded 6800 stackable data. Loaded 6800 note data. Loaded 6800 sellable data. Loaded 6800 tradeable data. Loaded 6800 twohanded data. Loaded 199 item spawns. Loaded 8521 object definitions. Loaded 3 object spawns. Loaded 2715 npc definitions. Loaded 2933 npc spawns. Loaded 23 npc first click actions. Loaded 7 npc second click actions. Loaded 1 npc third click actions. Loaded 7 npc drop definitions (total 33 items). Loaded 69 dialogues. Found 3 Clan Files. Loaded 3 clan files. Found 2 Scripts. Loaded 2 scripts into memory. Loaded 9 shops. [font=Verdana][size=10pt] EVERYTHING IS CLASS HANDLED / SO EVERYTHING IS EASY TO FIND AND EDIT ! CANT GET MORE SIMPLER THAN THIS ! :][/size][/font]
-I wont get into deep details about features and such but you should figure than out by yourself .
PICTURES: [IMG]http://img245.imageshack.us/img245/5194/pic1wp.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img245.imageshack.us/img245/8533/pic2n.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/3283/pic3j.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/9527/pic4jg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/8691/84194752.jpg[/img]
[shadow=red,left] DOWNLOAD (Already contains client and server):[/shadow]
http://uppit.com/v/5d18f1so
Credits: DXX Development team .

item.description:

owner steve:

the port is set to 9000…fail.

so is the client .
only cause my counterstrike servers were using 43594 lol .

no soz my counterstrike servers are using ports 6007-17888

43594 is being used on my 2d emu game :]

pm me if interested in any of these games

all on a 16gb dedi!

item.title: ~_-VERSATILE - Greatest 317 base / Great for Starters & Pros !-_~
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“Ags Tank, post:12, topic:303383”]Hey dell, very nice server and client, I’m going to use it and would rep if I could but i just had a few questions I hoped you could answer.

  1. How do I make myself admin
  2. For adding animations to weapons, how would I do that because there is no class 20?
  3. If i wanted to add some customs later on (not much, just like d claws or something) what would i use in replace of the class 8?
    Thank you for your time, I hope I made everything clear enough.
    [center]Sincerely, Ags Tank[/center][/quote]

Sorry for late response .
1.To make your self admin go to : config>rights than add ur name to admins.java or the mods.java
2.the client is renamed so its basically in same place just renamed
3.refer to number 2 .

the only reason why i renamed client is because its easier and more organized to work with .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 06:12:37 pm[/size][hr][quote=“sabsabi, post:28, topic:303383”]Alright, Dell but seriously nice ! i like that source ! Client.java 60KB !! AMAZING ! doesnt lag computer seriously rep++,
but there something i dont understand how i can edit the character file? i only see .dat files[/quote]
thanks for feedback!

and for characters just go to savedGames folder, and if you are planning on editing items and what not which i cant think of a reason why you would want to , than you would have to get a dat viewer , and you will be able to view the character with its armor and change what you need to change .

Read full topic
item.source: ~_-VERSATILE - Greatest 317 base / Great for Starters & Pros !-_~

  2. For adding animations to weapons, how would I do that because there is no class 20?

    [center]Sincerely, Ags Tank[/center][/quote]
